title: Samsung Refrigerator Secondary Heater Kit
description: A Final Fix for One of Samsung's Biggest Fridge Failures - The Dreaded "Ice Ball" That Causes Leaks, No Cooling, and More! ATTENTION!!! Please DO NOT order this kit if you're in a country that uses 240v electricity, as it can melt/catch your fridge on fire or worse your house. For the 240v Overseas Kit (Click Here) This kit is designed to potentially fix the following problems on a Samsung French Door Refrigerator (although it could work on other styles as well): Refrigerator Cabinet Not Cooling Properly (due to ice build-up) Refrigerator Cabinet with Water in Drawers Refrigerator Making Noise due to Ice on Evaporator Fan Refrigerator Ice Build-Up inside Refrigerator Cabinet Please note this does not replace any part in your refrigerator: If you have a broken fan, or bad defrost heater rod, this will not fix those parts, and they will need replaced. If you have tried all the other "Solutions" to resolve any of the 4-mentioned issues and its still persisting, then a secondary heater kit is likely the solution. Included in the FULL kit: Silicone Defrost Heater - 18" / 15-watt model and 24" / 20-watt model, 3ft Power Cord Length. Power cord can be cut down to size needed, heat probe is bendable/foldable and is extremely flexible to custom fit to a needed solution, but cannot be cut. 14-16 AWG Posi-Tap Connectors OR 3m ScotchLok Wire Splicers 10 High Temperature, 6" Cable Ties 10mil vial of Silicone to waterproof new electrical lines + wooden applicator The Moisture Kit Includes: Samsung Defrost Drain Probe DA61-06796A 30" x 2" HVAC Tape for Liner & Evaporator Panel Repair Frost King© Insulated Tape for Drain Pan / Drainage Kit Update (4pcs at 6" with notched ends for water routing under drain pan) Samsung Drain Tube Kit (DA97-04049E) - To replace the older, cheaper and usually broken Samsung OEM drain tubes with a fresh, revised drain tube set. Included in the HEATER ONLY kit: Silicone Defrost Heater - 120V, 20 Watts, 36 in Heater Length, 3ft Power Cord Length. Power cord can be cut down to size needed, heat probe is bendable/foldable and is extremely flexible to custom fit to a needed solution. 14-16 AWG Posi-Tap Connectors OR 3m ScotchLok Wire Splicers 10 High Temperature, 6" Cable Ties 15mil vial of Silicone to waterproof new electrical lines + wooden applicator Compatability: This kit will work with all "French Door" Samsung refrigerators EXCEPT certain Flex Door models. The only known model that is incompatible is the RF23J9011 unit. If you are unsure if this kit will work with your flex-door Samsung, please contact us with your model# to confirm. Now with a 240v choice for our overseas shoppers. Overseas orders will have the 120v heater swapped for the 240v. Note: For International orders in countries using 240v electricity, we will ship the 18" heater probe only, as it is the only style we have in that voltage. title: Samsung Refrigerator Defrost Sensor DA32-10104N
description: The DA32-10104N is a newer revised version of other defrost and temperature sensors on a Samsung Refrigerator. It is approximately 9", and the Molex harness style should be noted. If this part goes bad in your refrigerator, it can cause temperatures to be erratic, or too high or low, depending on how it failed, as well as premature defrost termination. A typical sensor such as this one should measure 5,000 ohms @ 77*F when tested with a multimeter. If the number goes above or below that by 10%, its likely bad, causing many issues for your refrigerator.

title: 50ml Bounce-B-Gone Washing Machine Suspension Grease and Foam Set BA-80048
description: If your washing machine is bouncing, try this! Now includes 4 Foam inserts for Samsung Suspension Rods as well. For years, if your washing machine was bouncing around, causing noise, unbalanced loads, or other issues, there has been one straight and expensive solution: Replace the suspension rods. However, in the vast majority of situations where the washing machine has an issue, the rods aren't the problem, per-se, its the dampening system. Over years of use, factory greases and dampening systems degrade due to general use or more rapidly due to overloading. Our kinematic grease restores your machines damping rods to factory or beyond-factory quality at a fraction of the price. Additionally packed in the kit are 4x pieces of replacement foam for your suspension system. In many cases, the foam degrades over time, requiring replacement along with the grease. Although potentially optional in some cases, feedback on the foam with the grease has been beyond positive, so they are now included in each pack. Simply apply the grease to wherever the damping system is, and it will slow the motion of the rods' rapid movement in spin mode. There are many DIY fixes on the market for all model washers, but a factory-designed grease offers a solution for all makes and models of washing machines using rod & spring dampng systems. Better yet, this works to restore shock absorbers on front load machines too! As crazy as it is, this is a one-size-fits-all solution to one of the most vexxing problems of machines. Although the grease comes in a 50ml jar, it is enough grease to restore between 4-8 machines. 500ml jars are available for servicers that require larger more frequent repairs of washing machines. description: A Recommended Addition to the Samsung Heater Kit One of the more pertinent items that technicians will replace when installing the drain kit and secondary heater kit is a new defrost sensor, as replacing it takes approximately 1 minute with the evaporator cover panel off. If the existing defrost sensor is off-specification, it could reduce the defrost time of the refrigerator, causing some of the icing conditions that the Samsung refrigerator is notorious for. However, this specific sensor is compatible with almost all Samsung French-door refrigerators and side-by-side units. Can also be used to replace the DA32-10104N if they're out of stock.

description: This is a single or double-use vial containing 1.8ml of blue threadlocker. This is used to secure threaded objects such as bolts or nuts to appliance parts. title: Silco 4500 RTV Sealant
description: T he most popular, best sealant for appliances! RTV ( room temperature vulcanizing) sealant is one of the most useful things in appliance repair, due to its ability to seal an area effectively, making it both moisure-resistant and airflow-restricting. There are quite a few uses for this kind of sealant, between restoring refrigerator door gaskets, repairing door boots in washers, and sealing refrigerators where liners have left a gap. Many, many technicians use the Silco brand sealant, and we've had phenomenal results with it at our store - we think you will too. ﻿One of the primary uses for this would be in tandem with our Secondary Heater Kit to seal the plastic evaporator panel to the refrigerator once the kit is installed, to seal moisture from getting in or out during normal operation as another way to guarantee the refrigerator doesn't ice up.

title: Wash Bomb Washing Machine Cleaning Solution
description: Tired of sights, smells and stuff hiding behind your washing machines' tub? Do you want a product that will clean out your washer, making it run at its best for as long as possible? Introducing our Wash Bomb. A custom-made blend of cleaners and deodorizers meant to help your washer be its best. It'll work for dishwashers too! What's in the package? It's a proprietary blend of (in order by weight): Citric Acid Aluminum-Free Sodium Bicarbonate Sodium Carbonate Sodium Percarbonate (Oxi-Clean) Liplase Amylase Protease It's a blend we've been working on mixing to proper portions for years, testing in thousands of washing machines. Even when you purchase the package, we are still testing and refining the mixtures. Each bag contains 15.5oz of the mixture. Depending on size of washing machine, the bag will last between 8 - 16 months. We suggest an initial large dose of 1/3 - 1/2 cup of the mixture on the first attempt, and 1/8 - 1/4 cup on follow-up washes. This is best used every 30 washes, or every month, whichever is longer. NOW AVAILABLE: BIGGER KIT The new BIGGER BOMB kit includes the following items: A larger 2lb bag of WASH BOMB cleaning solution Anti-Rust, Anti-Iron, Anti-Hard Water cleaner for your front-load washing machine Door Boot Seal Mold Remover - contains approx 0.5oz of super concentrated pool shock chlorine crystals inside of a mixing pouch, with a 1/2" applicator brush. This kit is designed to clean tougher problems typically seen in front-load washing machines. However, the kit will work for both front and top-load washing machines. The door boot seal mold remover is NOT dishwasher safe due to chemicals contained within the shock.

title: Frigidaire Garage Heater Kit 5303918301 + Easy-Install Switching System
description: This kit is designed to allow your refrigerator to run properly in cold weather, as well as allow the owner to shut off the heater when needed, saving time and money. When a standard garage heater kit is installed to a refrigerator, it forces the unit to run non-stop. Without a way to stop the heater running, it will run constantly even in spring, summer and fall causing higher electric bills and a lower lifespan of the refrigerator. With the addition of an inline switch, you can cut power to the heater only, without needing to disassemble the unit and remove the heater kit after each winter season. To install the kit, you only need a 3/4" drill bit, and a screwdriver to remove the cold control assembly and defrost timer to install the switch and heater kit. This set includes the following: 5303918301 Frigidaire Foil Heater with pre-cut wires for assembly 120v/6a Rocker Switch 2x Posi-Lock Tool-less wire splicers Please note that garage heater kits are designed for mechnically-timed and controlled refrigerators. If your refrigerator uses an adaptive defrost board and control board, this is unlikely to work for you. Your refrigerator MUST have a mechanical cold control system to use this style kit. For our new 120v Universal System that can work with control boards that have a 120v line going to the control board, use this item: https://bens-appliances.com/products/garage-heater-kit-universal-120v-system

title: Samsung Dryer Element + Housing and Sensors DC97-14486A
description: Will This Work for my Samsung Dryer? This is the FULL plug and play Samsung Heating Element canister. You simply detach the old one, and screw in the new one where needed, and attach the two lead wires and you're DONE. No working with installing the new element - the full kit is completely pre-assembled for you. This kit contains the DC47-00019A heating element, the DC47-00018 Thermostat, and the DC96-00887 Thermal Fuse. If you are worried about assembling the heating system, then this is the easiest, best solution for you. The kit contains all the items related to full restoration of the heating system on your dryer, other than the thermistor, which can be added to this kit for a reduced price. BONUS: We now also include the DC32-00007A Dryer Thermistor free of charge. It will need installed to the blower housing, but with this new, free, included, sensor, all heating-based components will be able to be changed in one simple package. Warranty: We warranty all components within the heating element system for 6 months, not the cannister. If the heating system fails in your dryer within the 6 months, we kindly ask you test and verify which part failed that needs warrantied. Example: If the DC96-00887 Thermal Fuse fails on the heater cannister, we will happily and immediately send you a new thermal fuse, but not the 14486 cannister. Should components within the cannister fail due to a material defect of the cannister, we will replace the full assembly. However, due to our experience, the culprits tend to be the fuse or wiring, rather than cannister.

title: Samsung Dryer Heating Element DC47-00019A
description: Brand: Exact Replacement Warranty: 1 Mfg. Warranty This Samsung Heater is Made in North America Will This Element Work for my Dryer? If your Samsung Dryer is having heating issues, the element is the central culprit in the dryer. Without it operating properly, your dryer will never get hot. The ERP Samsung Heating Element is a fantastic solution that has OEM Quality at a non-OEM price. A Cheaper Kit is Available from Another Vendor The element isn't the only thing in the heat system, though: sensors can also fail that will cause the element never to get hot, as the electricity does not properly reach the system. Most professional technicians agree that when you replace the element, going ahead and replacing all sensors is a good idea, as it basically rebuilds the entire heating system. We now stock both the "Short" (13718C) and "Long" (15217D) ice maker for most Samsung ice makers made from 2013 through 2021. These icemakers are a common part of the ice maker not working failure, and are also prone to warping or damage when the ice making cabinet is overheated by a hair dryer or other extremely hot warming device that isn't the defroster. Note that the DA97-15217 unit is longer, and features 10 ice cubes for full-depth Samsung refrigerators, and the DA97-13718C is for the shorter, counter-depth 8-cube model of ice maker. title: Bounce-B-Gone Washing Machine Suspension Grease, 500ml Tub BA-80048-500ML
description: A BIGGER TUB FOR A LOT MORE JOBS! This is the exact same recipe as the smaller, 50ml jar size which is perfect for a few washing machines. The larger 500ml tub is designed for appliance repair techs that need to refurbish dozens, if not 100 washing machines to prevent them from jumping around. Product size: 500ml jar (internal capacity) / 1.1b of damping grease. Product is 1.4lb including jar and lid. _____________________ For years, if your washing machine was bouncing around, causing noise, unbalanced loads, or other issues, there has been one straight and expensive solution: Replace the suspension rods. However, in the vast majority of situations where the washing machine has an issue, the rods aren't the problem, per-se, its the dampening system. Over years of use, factory greases and dampening systems degrade due to general use or more rapidly due to overloading. Our kinematic grease restores your machines damping rods to factory or beyond-factory quality at a fraction of the price. Simply apply the grease to wherever the damping system is, and it will slow the motion of the rods' rapid movement in spin mode. There are many DIY fixes on the market for all model washers, but a factory-designed grease offers a solution for all makes and models of washing machines using rod & spring dampng systems. Better yet, this works to restore shock absorbers on front load machines too! As crazy as it is, this is a one-size-fits-all solution to one of the most vexxing problems of machines. Although the grease comes in a small 20ml jar, it is enough grease to restore between 4-8 machines. 500ml jars will be available in the near future as well for servicers that require larger more frequent repairs of washing machines. Specs: Viscosity target: 27,000 cSt NLGI: 2.5+ Penetration 25*C 0.1mm: 220-250 Base Oil: Mineral w/ Polymer Thickener

title: Samsung Heater Repair Kit Package - DC47-00019A, DC96-00887A, DC47-00018A, DC47-00016A, DC32-00007A
description: This is a pre-made, fully assembled repair kit for your Samsung dryer. This is a basic grade system with a 6 month warranty on all of the components. It stops heat from operating at 260*F, and then begins to allow it to return on at 210F (-50 less than the cutoff). 1 x DC47-00016A thermal fuse - This is the safety fuse that goes on the heater can with a ~325*F cutoff that will permanently trip if the heating can gets overly hot or overheated, and if it blows, will prevent heat from working all together. 1 x DC32-00007A thermistor - this is a moderator thermistor for the blower housing that provides the control system output data, if the heat cycle needs to be adjusted. It should be around 11,900 ohms @ 70*F. 1 x DC96-00887C thermal fuse - this is the blower housing thermal fuse. description: The shift actuator has a small electric motor that is responsible for shifting your washing machine from agitate to spin mode. description: This is a Samsung Refrigerator Temperature Sensor for many side by side and french door refrigerators. Its compatible with multiple other Samsung Temperature Sensor part numbers. title: Samsung 3-Wire Dryer Element + Housing and Sensors DC93-00154A
description: This is the FULL plug and play Samsung Heating Element canister. You simply detach the old one, and screw in the new one where needed, and attach the two lead wires and you're DONE. title: Whirlpool Washer Capacitor(s)
description: If your Whirlpool washing machine is agitating and spinning slowly, never reaching full capacity, its possible your capacitor could be damaged or discharging at a level that never allows the machine to operate properly. Typically, this can be verified with a multimeter, or visual inspection of the capacitor being potentially damaged. We offer the 2 major styles of Whirlpool capacitors with different capacitance values. Its critical you choose one with the right "UF" value as the right one will be much longer lasting than one that is off-spec. W10278556 has a 45 uf value, and has a replacement part # of: W10804665, which is the one we currently stock and sell for the 45uf Capacitor. description: This is a basic Whirlpool washer belt for 2009-Current washing machines - "Vertical Modular Washers". title: Samsung Refrigerator Evaporator Cover DA97-12608A
description: If your evaporator cover becomes too waterlogged, has styrofoam damage, or has cracked severely, replacing it is very important. This assembly replaces both the entire panel AND the fan as one unit. description: The GE WR55X10025 is a nearly-universal temperature sensor used in nearly every GE Side by Side and French Door-configured refrigerator made. If this sensor is defective, you'll find an open short on a multimeter between pins 4 and 5 on the control board. This sensor has the same resistance reading of the Samsung Refrigerator Defrost sensor line, and should test approximately 5k ohms (5,000 ohms) at 77*F. In the very near future, we'll offer a "Splice Kit" add-on that will make splicing this into your refrigerator even easier and pain-free.

title: Samsung Universal Dryer Thermostat - L250 - DC47-00018A
description: The L250 is a universal type dryer thermostat that mounts with 2 screws and has 2 1/4 inch terminals for wires. It cuts off at 250 degrees fahrenheit and then allows current again when the temperature drops down to 210 degrees (40 degree differential). This is perfect for many Samsung dryers as well as other brand dryers.

title: GE Refrigerator Defrost Thermostat WR50X10068
description: The GE WR50X10068 Defrost Bi-Metal Thermostat is the most popular, basic thermostat for GE refrigerators, and is used in a huge number of GE Side by Side refrigerators . The temperature range is from 140-30*F. If this part is defective, the defrost heater simply will not run. The only way to test this part is to ensure its within the temperature specification, and use a multimeter to test continuity. A tell-tale sign of a defective defrost sensor is a swollen black cap, indicating failure. This part# replaces: WR50X10015, WR50X10017, WR50X10018, WR50X10028, WR50X10051, WR50X10052, WR50X10053, WR50X10054, WR50X10074, WR50X10075, WR50X10079.

We also recommend replacing the component that the wire was connected to if it also showed damage or degradation of its spade terminals, but is not required in every situation.
